verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: We sent it down on the Night of Decree.
verse.verse_2: But what will convey to you what the Night of Decree is?
verse.verse_3: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
verse.verse_4: In it descend the angels and the Spirit, by the leave of their Lord, with every command.
verse.verse_5: Peace it is; until the rise of dawn.
